title: Can I do science courses after BBA? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear, The education system is designed in a pyramid structure. In the beginning you study all the subjects but as you grow and complete your 10th class you select your area of interest and then study those subject to grow vertically in your chosen area. BBA is your chosen area after careful thought. It is a professional course and hence you should vertically graduate in that area. University allows science subjects only if you have studied the same in undergraduate level.

you can pursue whatever you want to , but definitely all colleges have some set of criteria.. you need to go through them. one thing i am sure is you can pursue masters in science, like IT, MIS and some other
